quote_first: One hundred and thirty-one seconds were lost at Elkhart in changing locomotives, and it was
quote_last: when big 599, with Dave Luce in the cab, turned her nose toward the dawning day and started for Toledo, 133 miles away.
title: Careers of Danger and Daring
author: Cleveland Moffett

quote_first: It was not until they had swept through the village, over the bridge, and were out on the broad highway toward Chester that Ruth began to realize what a wild goose chase she had undertaken. Just where did she expect to find them, anyway? It was now
quote_last: by the little clock in the car and it was a full fifteen minutes’ drive to Chester.
title: The Search
author: Grace Livingston Hill

quote_first: The second said the same thing a
quote_last: , and mentioned eternity… I’m sure I’ll meet you in the other world. Four minutes later she left a last, fleeting message: My love. Fernando. It’s Suzana. Then, it seemed, she had shot herself.
title: A Death in Brazil: A Book of Omissions
author: Peter Robb
